Hero.title: Plan Meetings in Just 1 Minute
Hero.subtitle: Or more... :)
Hero.description: Tired of traditional meeting planning? Schedule quickly and efficiently with PLANBUDDY.

Features.title: Key Features
Features.description: Discover how PLANBUDDY revolutionizes your meeting planning experience with these powerful features.

feature1.title: Easy Meeting Setup
feature1.description: Set up in-person or online meetings with all necessary details.

feature2.title: Quick Sharing
feature2.description: Simply share the meeting by URL or QR so they can fill in their available times.

feature3.title: View Common Free Time
feature3.description: Easily see when everyone is available to make decision.

feature4.title: Manage Appointments
feature4.description: Keep track of all your scheduled meetings effortlessly.

feature5.title: Flexible Login
feature5.description: Sign in with Google or as a guest. No stupid asking questions.

feature6.title: Google Integration
feature6.description: Sync with Google Calendar and People for enhanced user experience.

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.description: Follow these simple steps to plan your meetings efficiently with PLANBUDDY

step1.title: Create A Meeting
step1.description: Set up your meeting with all necessary details.

step2.title: Share With Participants
step2.description: Invite others to fill in their available times by URL or QR.

step3.title: Find Common Time
step3.description: Easily view when everyone is available.

step4.title: Schedule and Notify
step4.description: Confirm the meeting time and notify all participants.

Testimonials.title: What our users say
Testimonials.description: Discover how PLANBUDDY has transformed meeting planning for professionals across industries

quote1.quote: PLANBUDDY has revolutionized how we schedule team meetings. It's so quick and efficient!
quote1.author: Post MaLong

quote2.quote: The ease of use and Google Calendar integration make this tool indispensable for our organization.
quote2.author: Isaac Leviethanh
